unnormalised: Gurgaon traffic strikes again! Commuters were stuck for 2 hrs this morning near IFFCO Chowk thanks to a stray cow and a wedding procession. Sources say the auto-rickshaw drivers were having a field day, charging Rs. 300 for a 1 km ride.
normalised: Gurgaon traffic strikes again! Commuters were stuck for two hours this morning near I-F-F-C-O Chowk thanks to a stray cow and a wedding procession. Sources say the auto-rickshaw drivers were having a field day, charging rupee three hundred for a one kilometer ride.

unnormalised: Seems like someone forgot to tell the cow it's not supposed to cause traffic jams. Maybe it was late for its own 'moo-hurat'? Meanwhile, the baraat, complete with dhol and dancing, added to the chaos. Tip: Next time, book a helicopter, folks!
normalised: Seems like someone forgot to tell the cow it is not supposed to cause traffic jams. Maybe it was late for its own 'moo-hurat'? Meanwhile, the baraat, complete with dhol and dancing, added to the chaos. Tip: Next time, book a helicopter, folks!

unnormalised: On a more serious note, police confirmed 5 minor accidents happened thanks to people trying to "escape" the jam. Commuters suggest implementing cow-operated traffic lights and designating a separate "baraat lane" for future events. Stay safe out there, Delhi NCR!
normalised: On a more serious note, police confirmed five minor accidents happened thanks to people trying to "escape" the jam. Commuters suggest implementing cow-operated traffic lights and designating a separate "baraat lane" for future events. Stay safe out there, Delhi N-C-R!
